DesTokenSale.fallback (/unique_chucks/20/0xd1265bfe57597840f89971b7e67538bac780f9ad.sol#291-311) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- token.balanceOf(msg.sender) == 0

Reentrancy in DesTokenSale.fallback (/unique_chucks/20/0xd1265bfe57597840f89971b7e67538bac780f9ad.sol#291-311):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(token.balanceOf(msg.sender).add(tokens) <= purchaseLimit) (/unique_chucks/20/0xd1265bfe57597840f89971b7e67538bac780f9ad.sol#298-299)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSelling (/unique_chucks/20/0xd1265bfe57597840f89971b7e67538bac780f9ad.sol#302-303)
